title: 服务器后台报错刷屏
author: pengfen002
txt_content:
2014-08-26 12:40:11 [SEVERE] Encountered Exception while charging/decharging Items
2014-08-26 12:40:11 [SEVERE] java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: universalelectricity/compatibility/Compatibility
2014-08-26 12:40:11 [SEVERE]         at gregtechmod.api.metatileentity.BaseMetaTileEntityUE.dischargeItem(BaseMetaTileEntityUE.java:42)
2014-08-26 12:40:11 [SEVERE]         at gregtechmod.api.metatileentity.BaseMetaTileEntity.func_70316_g(BaseMetaTileEntity.java:420)
2014-08-26 12:40:11 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.world.World.func_72939_s(World.java:2782)
2014-08-26 12:40:11 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71190_q(MinecraftServer.java:883)
2014-08-26 12:40:11 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.dedicated.DedicatedServer.func_71190_q(DedicatedServer.java:330)
2014-08-26 12:40:11 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.func_71217_p(MinecraftServer.java:777)
2014-08-26 12:40:11 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.MinecraftServer.run(MinecraftServer.java:659)
2014-08-26 12:40:11 [SEVERE]         at net.minecraft.server.ThreadMinecraftServer.run(ThreadMinecraftServer.java:16)复制代码

服务器MOD有格雷

服务器内只要是有玩家给电力用品充电，比如飞行背包什么的
服务器后台就会无脑刷这个错误，无限刷，1秒钟上百行
求告知是哪个插件冲突了还是有问题
以前没这个报错的

replies.author: pengfen002
replies.txt_content:
stevem 发表于 2014-8-26 19:09
楼主这是在干嘛- -
= = 啊?我只是求助

replies.author: aegul
replies.txt_content: 格雷的问题吧，我记得那个mod真叫一个坑，不仅难得要死，而且问题百出，我经常玩一会就莫名其妙得崩溃，而且格雷对服务器的兼容不是很好
